text: Moshimo shinja ga 2tsu ni wakarete arasoeba, ryōsha no ma o chōtei shi nasai. Moshi kare-ra no ippō ga tahō ni taishite,(ippō-teki ni) muhōna koto o surunaraba, muhōmono ga arrā no meirei ni tachikaeru made tatakai nasai. Daga kare-ra ga tachi kaettanaraba, seigi to kōhei o mune to shite kare-ra no ma o chōtei shi nasai. Hontōni arrā wa kōseina mono o aisa reru
